summary.span: 一个从单一源接收多播流量的客户端，亦称为源特定多播 (SSM)。

span.span: A client receiver for multicast traffic from a single source, also known as Source Specific Multicast (SSM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多路广播组地址和发件人源地址必须是已知的。The multicast group address and sender source address must be known. 除了从特定发件人接收多播数据外， 客户端还可以将单播数据发送回发送方。In addition to receiving multicast data from a specific sender, the client can also send unicast data back to the sender. 若要从多个源接收多播，或在未提前知道源的情况下使用类，请改用 类。To receive multicast from multiple sources, or when the sources aren't known in advance, use the class instead.

param.name: sourceAddress
param.span: 此接收器要订阅的发送器源地址。

span.span: The sender source address for this receiver to subscribe to.

param.name: groupAddress
param.span: 此接收器要订阅的多播组地址。

span.span: The multicast group address for this receiver to subscribe to.

param.name: localPort
param.span: 此接收器要绑定到的本地端口。

span.span: The local port for this receiver to bind to.

summary.span: 创建一个可以订阅组地址并从单一源接收数据报的新 UDP 客户端。

span.span: Creates a new UDP client that can subscribe to a group address and receive datagrams from a single source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将 UDP 多播套接字与组地址和端口关联，但不绑定或以其他方式使用套接字。The constructor associates a UDP multicast socket with a group address and port, but does not bind or otherwise use the socket. 参数可以是 `groupAddress` IPv6 或 IPv4 多播地址。The `groupAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address. 但是，和参数的地址族 `sourceAddress` `groupAddress` 必须相同。However, the address family of the `sourceAddress` and `groupAddress` parameters must the same. `localPort`参数不得指定小于1024的端口。The `localPort` parameter must not specify a port less than 1,024.

exception.span: 和 必须为相同地址族。

span.span: and must be the same address family.

exception.span: 为 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

-or-

is less than 1024

param.span: 要为此操作传递给 方法的可选状态信息。

summary.span: 绑定套接字并开始多播组的联接操作，以便允许接收来自单个源地址的数据报。

span.span: Binds the socket and begins a join operation to the multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from a single source address.
An that references this operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 UDP 多播套接字绑定到本地端口，并联接多播组，以允许从单个源地址接收数据报。The method binds a UDP multicast socket to a local port and joins a multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from a single source address. 要绑定到的多播组地址、单个源地址和本地端口都在 构造函数中指定。The multicast group address, single source address, and local port to bind to are specified in the constructor. `callback`当联接多播组的操作已完成时，将调用参数中指定的方法。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when the operation to join the multicast group has completed. 如果运行时需要，该 方法还执行策略检查以验证是否允许客户端访问多路广播组。If required by the runtime, the method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group. 如果不允许客户端访问， 则会引发 。If the client is not allowed access, a is thrown with .

exception.span: 已经联接多播组，或联接操作正在进行。

span.span: The multicast group has already been joined or a join operation is currently in progress.
The has been disposed.

exception.span: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

span.span: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

summary.span: 开始执行从已联接的多播组接收数据包的操作，并在来自指定发送器的数据包到达组时调用指定的回叫。

span.span: Begins the operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and invokes the specified callback when a packet has arrived on the group from a specified sender.
An that references this operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法开始从一个发送方的已联接的多播组接收 UDP 数据包的操作。The method begins an operation of receiving a UDP packet from the joined multicast group from a single sender. 本地端口、多播组和发件人源地址在 构造函数中指定。The local port, multicast group, and sender source address are specified in the constructor. 多播客户端还必须已完成到多播组的联接。The multicast client must also have completed a join to the multicast group. 接收到数据包时，将调用参数中指定的方法 `callback` 。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received. 如果接收操作同步失败，则可能会出现套接字故障，但这种情况不太常见。It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP. 如果出现套接字故障， 则会引发。If a socket failure occurs, a is thrown. 收到的错误被指定为枚举的成员 。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法开始向之前指定的源发送 UDP 数据包的操作。The method begins an operation of sending a UDP packet to the source previously specified. 某些协议使用此信息传递流控制、服务统计信息或恢复消息。Some protocols use this information to pass along flow control, quality of service statistics, or recovery messages. 发送数据包时，将调用参数中指定的方法 `callback` 。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has been sent. 客户端必须已完成到多播组的联接。The client must have completed a join to the multicast group. 如果参数中指定的目标端口 `remotePort` 小于1024， 则会引发 。If the destination port specified in the `remotePort` parameter is less than 1,024, a is thrown with . 如果发送操作同步失败，则可能会出现套接字故障，但这种情况并不常见。It is possible to have a socket failure if a send operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP. 如果出现套接字故障， 则会引发。If a socket failure occurs, a is thrown. 收到的错误被指定为枚举的成员 。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

summary.span: 离开多播组并释放 类和基础 的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Leaves the multicast group and releases all resources used by the current instance of the class and the underlying the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后 ，必须释放对的所有引用， 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存 。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成到套接字的异步绑定，并将操作联接到多播组。The method completes an asynchronous bind to a socket and join operation to a multicast group. 如果运行时需要，该 方法还执行策略检查以验证是否允许客户端访问多路广播组。If required by the runtime, the method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group. 如果不允许客户端访问， 则会引发 。If the client is not allowed access, a is thrown with . 如果在执行联接组操作时出现套接字错误， 则会引发。If there is a socket failure while performing the join group operation, a is thrown. 收到的错误被指定为枚举的成员 。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位），该缓冲区用于此 实例上的多播接收操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the used for multicast receive operations on this instance.
Returns .

value.span: 接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the receive buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReceiveBufferSize`属性获取或设置 用于此实例上的多播接收操作的基础的接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位） 。The `ReceiveBufferSize` property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the underlying used for multicast receive operations on this instance. 具体而言， `ReceiveBufferSize` 属性控制堆栈在包到达时使用的缓冲区大小，但应用程序尚未调用 方法。Specifically, the `ReceiveBufferSize` property controls the size of the buffer used by the stack when a packet arrives, but the application has not yet called the method. 如果此缓冲区已满，并且包在应用程序调用和方法之前继续存在 ，则将删除旧的数据包。If this buffer gets filled up and packets keep coming before the application calls the and methods, old packets will get dropped. 应用程序将永远无法接收旧数据包，并将在调用方法时接收到较新的数据包 。The application will never be able to receive the old packets, and will instead receive newer packets when it calls the method. Windows 上的接收缓冲区的默认大小为8192。The default size of the receive buffer on Windows is 8,192.

exception.span: 指定的缓冲区大小小于 0。

span.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

value.span: 发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the send buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SendBufferSize 属性获取或设置基础的发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位），该缓冲区 用于此实例上的多播发送操作 。The SendBufferSize property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the underlying used for multicast send operations on this instance. 在 Mac OS X 上， 属性控制在其他方法启动失败之前，网络堆栈等待发送的缓冲区中的字节数 。On Mac OS X, the property controls how many bytes can be in the network stack's waiting-to-be-sent buffer before additional calls to the method start failing. 如果应用程序在较短时间内发送大量 UDP 数据包，则 Mac OS X 上的应用程序可能需要与此属性相关。Applications on Mac OS X may need to be concerned with this property if they are sending a large number of UDP packets in a short timeframe. 在 Windows 上， 如果发送缓冲区已满，调用方法将需要更长的时间来调用回调。On Windows, calls to the method will take longer to call the callback depending on the value of the property if the send buffer is full. 属性仅控制用户的缓冲区是否在物理内存中保持锁定状态，直到发送完成。The property only controls whether the user's buffer stays locked in physical memory until the send completes. Windows 上的发送缓冲区的默认大小为8192。The default size of the send buffer on Windows is 8,192.

exception.span: 指定的缓冲区大小小于 0。

span.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.
